mosqito.sq_metrics.loudness.loudness_ecma.loudness_ecma module

@author: Daniel Jiménez-Caminero Costa

mosqito.sq_metrics.loudness.loudness_ecma.loudness_ecma.loudness_ecma(signal, sb=2048, sh=1024)[source]

Calculation of the specific and total loudness according to ECMA-418-2 section 5

Parameters

signal: numpy.array

time signal values in ‘Pa’. The sampling frequency of the signal must be 48000 Hz.

sb: int or list of int

block size.

sh: int or list of int

Hop size.

Returns

n_specific: list of numpy.array

Specific Loudness [sone_HMS per Bark]. Each of the 53 element of the list corresponds to the time-dependant specific loudness for a given bark band. Can be a ragged array if a different sb/sh are used for each band.

bark_axis: numpy.array

Bark axis
